Learn More Tesla (TSLA -2.25%) is losing power as an electric vehicle manufacturer, resulting in falling margins and slowing revenue growth. But one company continues to make billions in cash, and it's buying back a huge chunk of its shares. In this video, Travis Hoium highlights that stock and why Tesla isn't the best auto stock to buy today. *Stock prices used were end-of-day prices of Jan. 19, 2024.
